tags: Wait time,
review: Waiting time is so long. We were waiting for more than 45 mint. Please asign lot as per availability. There is no point standing nd waiting. Not liked the service.
reply_text: Hi. My aim is to keep the wait time as low as possible. Most of the patients I do see on time but sometimes delay happens due to various reasons. Eg this time I had to see an emergency  case which needed more time as he came with severe breathing difficulty . So obviously all the subsequent appointments got delayed. For this reason while booking appointment it is very clearly mentioned that there may be a waiting time  upto 60 min.Also during the pandemic we cannot allow patients to crowd in the waiting room. So best is to wait in an open area outside clinic and come in when called  ...I totally understand that its uncomfortable especially with kids but it goes a long way to prevent  transmission of corona ...Thank you for your feedback...
